Sentencas: Thin ceramic films of samaria-doped ceria (SDC) were deposited on green NiO-SDC substrate via a slurry spin coating technique followed by co-firing.
Titulo: Fabrication of ceramic films for solid oxide fuel cells via slurry spin coating technique

Sentencas: The ceramic films as-prepared are homogenous and dense, without cracks and penetrating pinholes, as observed from cross-sectional SEM images.
Titulo: Fabrication of ceramic films for solid oxide fuel cells via slurry spin coating technique

Sentencas: The thicknesses of the ceramic films for one coating run can be adjusted between 0.8 and 9 mu m by altering the spin rate.
Titulo: Fabrication of ceramic films for solid oxide fuel cells via slurry spin coating technique

Sentencas: The film thickness (h) is inversely proportional to the logarithm of the spin rate (Log(f)) in the range of 3000-10,000 mu m.
Titulo: Fabrication of ceramic films for solid oxide fuel cells via slurry spin coating technique

Sentencas: The slurry spin coating procedure is largely a competition between the thinning and the drying.
Titulo: Fabrication of ceramic films for solid oxide fuel cells via slurry spin coating technique

Sentencas: Half-cells with both 15 and 25 mm diameters were fabricated.
Titulo: Fabrication of ceramic films for solid oxide fuel cells via slurry spin coating technique

Sentencas: In addition, YSZ electrolyte layer with a thickness of 15 mu m was also deposited with a homogeneous and completely dense microstructure by two runs of slurry spin coating.
Titulo: Fabrication of ceramic films for solid oxide fuel cells via slurry spin coating technique
Fabrication of ceramic films for solid oxide fuel cells via slurry spin coating technique
